refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: g-dot converts the specified object(s) from a BRL-CAD database.g file to the DOT language format. The -o option specifies an output .dot file (writes to stdout by default).
The DOT language format is a plain text format for describing graphs. Programs like Graphviz, Tulip, OmniGraffle, and others can render .dot files (such as those produced by g-dot) as images.

refsect1.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsect1.para: Error messages are intended to be self-explanatory.
